DOC.brief_summary: The investigators objectives were developing mini dose five-drug cocktail regimen to evaluate potential drug-drug interactions associated with use of a cocktail of caffeine, losartan, omeprazole, dextromethorphan, and midazolam for simultaneous assessment of CYP1A2, CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6, and CYP3A activities.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Minidose Inje Cocktail Method for Simultaneous Evaluating Five Cytochrome P450 Isoforms in Human
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators objectives were developing minidose five-drug cocktail regimen to evaluate potential drug-drug interactions associated with use of a cocktail of caffeine, losartan, omeprazole, dextromethorphan, and midazolam for simultaneous assessment of CYP1A2, CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6, and CYP3A activities.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject whose CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6 genotype was determined Subject who has abnormal laboratory test results
